definition: scattered/loose/to come loose/to fall apart/leisurely/powdered medicine
to scatter/to break up (a meeting etc)/to disperse/to disseminate/to dispel/(coll.) to sack
to arrange/to line up/file/series/(in data tables) column/(Tw) row

sentences.english: The associated hashing algorithm is used for providing integrity services.
sentences.chinese: 相關聯的散列算法用來提供完整性服務。

sentences.english: The underlying provider will take care of all necessary password hashing or decryption.
sentences.chinese: 底層的提供者會處理好必要的密碼散列或解密。

sentences.english: See the Equality Predicates and Hash Functions section for more details.
sentences.chinese: 更多細節請見等同性謂詞和散列函數一節。

sentences.english: For simplicity, the stock information is stored in a hash map.
sentences.chinese: 爲了簡單起見，該股票信息存儲在散列圖中。

sentences.english: The former is the hashing routine, while the latter is used for lookup.
sentences.chinese: 前者是一個散列例程，而後者用於執行查找。

sentences.english: This data can be table or hash clusters.
sentences.chinese: 這個數據可以是表或散列集羣。

sentences.english: The cryptographic strength of HMAC depends on the properties of the underlying hash function.
sentences.chinese: HMAC的加密強度取決於基礎散列函數的屬性。

sentences.english: Star join plan utilizes push-down hash join technology.
sentences.chinese: 星型連接計劃利用下推散列連接技術。

sentences.english: Avoid subscripting arrays or hashes within loops.
sentences.chinese: 避免在循環中使用下標數組或散列。

sentences.english: The larger the probe table is in a hash join, the slower the join is.
sentences.chinese: 散列連接中的探測表越大，連接就越慢。

sentences.english: Arrays and hashes, however, are more complex.
sentences.chinese: 然而，數組和散列更爲複雜。

sentences.english: The second method is to use the hash notation.
sentences.chinese: 第二種方法是使用散列表示法。

sentences.english: Hash-based partitioning, which provides significant scalability gains.
sentences.chinese: 基於散列的分區，這會顯著提高可伸縮性。

sentences.english: Hash to make a list of searches.
sentences.chinese: 散列來生成一個檢索的列表。

sentences.english: Tied hashes are easier to write than tied arrays, and more useful.
sentences.chinese: 綁定的散列比綁定的數組更易於編寫，而且更有用。

sentences.english: The cost of applying the partitioning hash algorithm is proportional to the size of the partitioning key.
sentences.chinese: 應用分區散列算法的代價與分區鍵的規模成比例。
